# stop()

**Instance Method**

Stops the sequencer’s player.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop()
```

## Discussion

Stopping the player leaves it in an unprerolled state, but stores the playback position so that a subsequent call to [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSequencer/start()] resumes where it stops. This action doesn’t stop an audio engine you associate with it.

## Operating an Audio Sequencer

- **prepareToPlay()**: Gets ready to play the sequence by prerolling all events.
- **start()**: Starts the sequencer’s player.
